dublin_core.dcvalue: A meeting on Biodiversity Technologies was held by the Biodiversity Institute Oxford on the 27 28 of September 2012 at the Department of Zoology University of Oxford The symposium brought together 36 speakers from North America Australia and across Europe presenting the latest research on emerging technologies in biodiversity science and conservation Here we present a perspective on the general trends emerging from the symposium
Biodiversity technologies: tools as change agents.
